instruments.title: Acoustic Guitar
instruments.description: A timeless 6-string acoustic guitar that produces warm, rich tones. Perfect for beginners and seasoned musicians alike.

instruments.title: Electric Guitar
instruments.description: A high-performance electric guitar with exceptional sound and playability. Ideal for rock, blues, and jazz enthusiasts.

instruments.title: Violin
instruments.description: Crafted with precision, this violin delivers a powerful sound and comes with an ebony fingerboard and fittings.

instruments.title: Drum Set
instruments.description: A professional 5-piece drum set complete with cymbals and hardware, perfect for live performances and studio sessions.

instruments.title: Digital Piano
instruments.description: An elegant digital piano featuring weighted keys and advanced sound technology for a realistic playing experience.

instruments.title: Flute
instruments.description: A silver-plated flute with a smooth, clear tone. Great for orchestras, solo performances, and beginners.

instruments.title: Synthesizer
instruments.description: A versatile synthesizer with built-in effects and MIDI compatibility for music production and live performances.

instruments.title: Saxophone
instruments.description: A beautifully crafted alto saxophone offering rich and dynamic tones. Ideal for jazz, classical, and pop music.

instruments.title: Ukulele
instruments.description: A compact, lightweight ukulele with a bright, cheerful sound. Perfect for casual and professional musicians.
